          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="nl">Engelse site met leuk materiaal...

Allerhande tips ...
Videofragmenten
Verschillende thema's: fruit, vissen, ijsjes, regenscherm, vriendjes, kleding, Kerst, eieren, getallen, vormen, letters, Halloween, spinnen, vogels, beren, vlinders...

 "My name is Shelley Lovett and I create learning activities for early childhood educators. I originally created this site with the child care professional in mind... but it really is for anyone who works with children on a daily basis - whether that is in the role of a child care provider - parent - or teacher - we should all be proud of the work that we do! This site features printable hands-on learning activities for pre-k and kindergarten children. There are file folder games ... flip books ... matching games... learning sheets ... craft projects ... video teaching tips ... flash learning pages... teaching ideas and more! Click on any of the links to the left to explore this site."

My name is Shelley Lovett and I create learning activities for early childhood educators. I originally created this site with the child care professional in mind... but it really is for anyone who works with children on a daily basis - whether that is in the role of a child care provider - parent - or teacher - we should all be proud of the work that we do! This site features printable hands-on learning activities for pre-k and kindergarten children. There are file folder games ... flip books ... matching games... learning sheets ... craft projects ... video teaching tips ... flash learning pages... teaching ideas and more!
